listing.listing_description: Set on 25-hectares in the heart of Umbria, including a private lake and vegetable garden, this fairytale-like farmhouse is the escape you’ve been waiting for. Use the chef’s kitchen to prepare fresh, organic meals for loved ones. Dine alfresco amongst the fragrant gardens, water features, and olive trees. If you’re feeling adventurous, take a day trip to visit the wonders of Rome.Built from stone and timber, this restored farmhouse is Umbria-authentic from the clay-shingled roof to the terracotta floors. Stately modern updates inside add a touch of elegance to the rugged-chic atmosphere, reminding guests of Italy’s natural beauty while pampering to their every whim. Arched doorways connect each chandelier-lit room, and flow out to the terrace, inviting the fresh breeze to join the party. Sip your morning coffee under the shaded pergola and catch up on some reading before the rest of the group wakes up. Work on your tan from one of the poolside sun loungers, hopping in when it gets too hot out. For lunch, pick some greens and vegetables from the garden for a farm-to-table salad. At night, light a fire and curl up with the family for popcorn and a movie on the plush living room sofa.Charge your camera batteries before you head to Paciano, a 14th-century medieval village about 15-minutes from home. Spend the day wandering narrow alleys, winding cobblestone streets, and snapping pics of ancient churches and castles. If there’s a golfer in the group, Lamborghini Panicale Golf Club is beautiful 9-hole that follows vineyards and Lake Trasimeno before finishing at their clubhouse restaurant.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular luxury villa near Saint-Rémy-de-Provence amid olive groves on an expansive, exquisitely landscaped estate in the piedmont of Les Alpilles. With panoramic views of the surrounding countryside including Mont Ventoux and the Luberon massif, the traditional mas estate provides sublime serenity within minutes of Eygalieres. Extraordinary alfresco living and dining spaces, 300 square meters of elegant living space, and five deluxe bedrooms sleeping ten guests compose an enchanting setting for unforgettable reunions with family and friends.Nestled amid six acres of olive orchard, fields of rosemary and lavender, and laurel groves, Mas des Cypress invites you to dreamy days and evenings in the exquisite light and air of Southern France. Play in the glittering swimming pool and sip cool refreshments on stylish sun loungers. Enjoy an alfresco meal in the beautiful, poolside pavilion. Multiple lounge areas with sumptuous furnishings and elegant parasols set the stage for cocktails parties and receptions, while lush lawns shaded by olive and cypress trees create a memorable tableau for memorable weddings and ceremonies.Indoors, a cavernous great room with soaring ceilings and exposed wood beams is ideal for festive evenings together. Drink fine French wine on superb sofas, opening the glass doors on warm evenings to invite the fragrant air inside. Prepare fabulous feasts in the fully equipped kitchen and gather around the adjoining dining table under vaulted ceilings and the gorgeous chandelier. At night, cuddle up in the cozy and spacious media room with your favorite films. Throughout the villa, superb original artwork and naturalistic detail harmonize Provencal rusticity with modern French elegance.All of the villa's bedrooms feature two twin beds that can be combined into kings. The beautiful master suite features a four-poster bed and adjoining lounge with doors to the garden; its ensuite bathroom features a stunning marble tub and stand-alone shower.Mas des Cypress will slake your thirst for exquisite solitude and serenity, while placing you in the heart of one of France's richest regions for natural beauty and cultural depth. Saint-Remy is just over ten kilometers away, while the Roman and papal splendor of Avignon is just thirty-five kilometers. Proximity to the cities and airports of Nime and Marseille make Mas des Cypress an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: One of the most remarkable Puglia villa rentals available, this restored 16th-century masseria (fortified farmhouse) stands proudly on the ancient Appian Way. If you are looking for a luxurious holiday retreat brimming with character and history, this stunning property is for you.Deep in the countryside and surrounded by olive groves, Villa Pizzorusso is the ideal place to get away from it all. The secluded gardens, filled with orange trees and aromatic herbs, are wonderfully private, and you’ll love the magnificent 80 ft (25 m) swimming pool. Enjoy a morning coffee or early evening aperitif on the extensive first-floor terrace and take in the views across the peaceful landscape.The character of the grand old masseria is still in evidence throughout. Enter the interior through the arched portal and step into a world of barrel-vaulted ceilings, stone arches and a wealth of period details that wouldn’t look out of place on a film set. Different parts of the building date from different eras: the main wing, complete with five cupolas and frescoed ceilings, was added in the 18th century, while the main living area – including an open-plan kitchen – is located within the 17th-century stables.There’s plenty of space to accommodate up to twelve guests. Each bedroom is air-conditioned and simply furnished with neutral tones and traditional wood furniture, while the bathrooms feature striking contemporary fixtures. Four of the bedrooms are located in the main villa with the two upstairs bedrooms having private entrances and secluded access from the ground floor, while two more are located in a smaller stone building in the courtyard.There is much to see and do in the area – from the beaches of the Ionian and Adriatic coasts, to the whimsical conical architecture of the local trulli dwellings. Gourmet travelers should stop at the charming local market town of Mesagne, with its bakeries, wine co-ops and cheese shops (the fresh mozzarella and ricotta are made daily). Puglia is also rich in picturesque medieval cities, such as Ostuni and Otranto, their atmospheric narrow streets lined with an abundance of restaurants specializing in the delectable local cuisine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Look out over the bustling square below, and on to the tilting bell tower of Santo Stefano at this contemporary apartment in the heart of Venice. Swing open the arched-windows and let the sounds of the city fill the elegant living room. When you’re ready to join, step outside and wander Venice’s winding streets and waterways. Attractions like Gallerie dell’Accademia are just minutes away.Decorated in a kaleidoscope of color, Dimora San Maurizio’s living room is an exciting place to entertain. The lengthy L-shaped sofa can accommodate several guests, or you could stretch out for movie night with the kids. Wood floors and white-washed ceiling beams add a rustic touch to the room, reminding guests of the building's historical roots. Fast-forward to the kitchen, where state of the art appliances and a contemporary dinner set are sure to spark your culinary creativity.Rather dine out? Head across the Rialto Bridge to the Cannaregio district, where you’ll find quieter streets lined with casual pubs and family-run restaurants. After dinner, head to the San Marco neighborhood for a night at La Fenice Opera House. Late, the Dorsoduro area is where you’ll find Venice’s hottest nightlife. Make your way back the next morning to visit 2 of the city’s top museums, Accademia Museum, and the Guggenheim Art Collection. And, when you’re ready for the beach, Lido di Venezia is 16-km from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Walk 5 minutes from Pego, one of Portugal’s most prestigious beaches to this ultra-modern countryside home. Gaze upon sweeping views of mature trees and dunes from the sunny rooftop terrace. Feel the breeze from everywhere inside this Bohemian, open-concept home. In the morning, head to Comporta Beach for a surfing lesson, conditions are ideal for beginners of all ages.Casa do Pego’s central courtyard, multi-sided terrace, and rooftop patio make it easy to flow from inside to out. Floor-to-ceiling openings connect each space, inviting a relaxing atmosphere, rich with fresh air and warm natural sunlight. Clean architecture and a fine blend of concrete, glass, and pine decking give this single-story villa a minimalistic, industrial vibe that will surely unclutter the mind. The suspended fireplace adds a futuristic touch of contemporary flair, while the tips of trees poking out onto the pool-deck remind you of the natural beauty that surrounds.Comporta is a hotspot for jet-set vacationers, famously known for its laid-back lifestyle and an incredible amount of pristine beachfront. After your surfing lesson, take a break and soak up the sun on Comporta Beach. When you’re ready for lunch, try a local dish, like chorizo with rice and linguica cooked in an earthen pot or wood-fired. After lunch, do a little souvenir shopping in Casa da Cultura or snap a few pics on the ancient wood docks of Cais Palafitico do Porto da Carrasqueira.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Palmento is a beautiful luxury home in the countryside of southeastern Sicily, situated on a private, twenty-four-acre estate near Caltagrione. Originally a winery, the vintage home has been beautifully restored and renovated into a contemporary vacation destination, featuring a heated saltwater swimming pool, two kitchens, superb living and dining areas, modern media features, and air conditioning. Four lovely bedroom suites (two in the main house, two in a guest house with its own kitchen) accommodate families and groups of friends up to eight in size.The expansive estate features ample lawns, fruit orchards, age-old olive trees, and gardens brimming with fragrant herbs and flowers. Explore the grounds on foot or bicycle before dipping into the refreshing pool. Bask in the Mediterranean sunlight on lounge chairs overlooking the hills, and sip cool drinks under the rustic canopy. Kindle the traditional grill and fill the air with the aromas of local delicacies, and gather for alfresco feasts in the mellowing afternoon. Lovely outdoor lighting (including floodlights in the pool) invite you to linger for hours under the stars.The main living room features comfortable modern sofas under high ceilings, with a Bose sound system and satellite TV. The adjoining dining room includes a farmhouse-style table, wood-beamed ceilings, and wide doors to the veranda. The kitchen also opens to the veranda and features chef-grade appliances for the contemporary cook. A separate den offers a haven for private downtime.In the main house, the master bedroom features a king bed, private balcony, TV, and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and soaking tub. The guest suite has a king bed and single-size bed, an ensuite bathroom with shower, and doors to a terrace. Both king beds features gorgeous headboards, one of which is made of an antique wine cask. The separate guesthouse has two queen suites with ensuite bathrooms.Beyond this serene rural sanctuary, you're just twelve kilometers from the town of Caltagirone, home of the extraordinary Staircase of Santa María del Monte, among other historic splendors. Nescemi is just sixteen kilometers, and you're about forty kilometers from the coastal beaches at Gela. Catania and Mount Etna make for lovely daytrips.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Buena Vista is a stunning luxury estate near the Sicilian town of Taormina. Located on the island's eastern coast between Messina and Catania, the four-bedroom villa features spectacular, panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea and Isola Bella, and enchanting outdoor and indoor spaces that echo and enhance the natural beauty of Sicily while evoking the splendor of its profound history.Perched on a cliffside, the villa's landscaped property overlooks the azure expanse of sea from its gorgeous gardens and terraces. Savor the Sicilian sun while bathing in the infinite swimming pool and relaxing on elegant loungers on the deck. Enjoy cocktails with family and friends in the covered, seaside lounge, or in a second lounge area aside a lovely jetted hot tub. In the afternoon, cook a delicious meal on the outdoor grill, and savor it together at the alfresco table. Take your morning espresso at the bistro set on the upper veranda, before strolling through the lush groves.From the alfresco dining area, glass doors open to an interior porch, furnished with sofas and armchairs—a perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening aperitif. In the adjoining room, the beautiful, fully equipped kitchen features chef-grade appliances and beautiful cabinetry and tile work, alongside a lovely dining table for six.The villa's four bedrooms—two on the ground floor, one on the first floor, and one in the guesthouse—provide ample accommodation for families destination wedding guests. The two ground-floor rooms and the guesthouse bedroom feature private entrances from outside. All of the bedroom suites have sumptuous double beds and gorgeous ensuite bathrooms, and each features its own, stunning décor, giving each guest and couple the feeling of an enchanting sanctuary imbued with the rhythms of the sea.Situated just ten kilometers (about six miles) from the town Taormina, and forty kilometers from the volcano of Mount Aetna, Villa Buena Vista combines dreamy seclusion and wonderful convenience. You'll reach the beach at Paradise Beach Club on foot or quickly by car, and you're also a short drive from the beaches of Letojanni and Mazzarò. The island and nature preserve of Isola Bella is easily reached. In Taormina, don't miss the ancient Greco-Roman theater, Teatro Antico di Taormina.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated on the eastern shore of Corfu, this stunning, three-level villa enjoys direct access to Barbati Beach through a private pathway and spectacular views of the Ionian Sea and neighboring islands. With four bedrooms accommodating eight, along with exquisite outdoor and indoor living spaces, Conti is a dream setting for destination wedding guests, family reunions, and groups of friends seeking a unique and stylish sanctuary in the Greek Isles.Perched on a hillside overlooking the sea, and nestled amid lush native flora, Conti's stunning terrace provides ample space for savoring the Mediterranean sun. Bathe in the gorgeous infinity swimming pool and relax on elegant loungers while gazing on the crescent shoreline and dreamy horizon. Withdraw into the lounge for a glass of fine, Greek wine in the filtered light of the stone-columned pergola. Prepare a delicious barbeque lunch and savor it together at the alfresco table for eight. The naturalistic but contemporary elegance of the furnishings and materials perfectly echoes and accentuates the beauty of your surroundings.From the veranda and pool terrace, lovely glass doors open to the villa's beautiful, light-filled interior, imbuing it with a plein-air feel. The fully equipped kitchen enjoys ocean-view windows and easy access to both the alfresco and interior dining areas. The dining table seats eight and enjoys lovely vistas as well, while the adjacent lounge is the ideal setting for nighttime relaxation over digestifs, or an espresso in the fresh morning.The bedrooms are serene and cool, with elegantly naturalistic furnishings, superb artwork and décor, and walls that glow with serene luminosity. The master suite features a queen bed, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. The three guest rooms—one with a queen bed, one with a double, and one with two twins—all feature direct access to the terrace as well as ensuite bathrooms.Conti offers an ideal balance of dreamy seclusion and well-situated convenience for relishing the precious beauty and fascinating history of the island. In addition to the pristine Barbati Beach beneath you, you're just four kilometers from Ipsos Village, and an easy drive from the town of Corfu, with its Venetian fortresses, medieval streets, and the spectacular Palace of St. Michael and St. George.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover the perfect pairing of old and new at Villa Levante. Perched high above the village of Kassiopi, this newly built Corfu vacation rental boasts sweeping views of nearby beaches and even the mountains of Albania in the distance—the classic scenery you’d expect from the Greek coast. Inside, however, this luxury villa is equipped with state-of-the-art smart-home technology, as well as accommodations for up to a dozen friends or family members.Villa Levante is nestled into lush gardens with pretty olive trees and stretches of grass where younger guests can play. Four pergola-covered outdoor living areas provide a respite from the Mediterranean sun, or you can soak in the views from the loungers on the terrace around the infinity pool. A barbecue makes it easy to serve up local specialties at the al-fresco dining area. Linger outside to watch the last light of the day play over the waves, or step inside to watch the satellite TV, put on a movie in the media room or cozy up to the wood-burning fireplace. There’s also a room with exercise equipment so you can keep up with your fitness routine while on holiday.The villa’s interiors are spare and charming, with beamed ceilings, wide tile floors and a sleek and simple fireplace surround. There’s space for the whole group on the low-slung sectional or around the wooden dining table, and the fully equipped kitchen has both a practical island layout and the small delight of an espresso machine. The house also has a Control Four smart-home system, which guests can use to change the lighting, temperature, shutters and more from five provided tablets, and several Sonos speakers that can be used to play guests’ own music collections.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Levante has a private en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and access to the pool terrace, a separate terrace or a balcony. The master bedroom has a queen bed and sea views, a second bedroom has a double bed, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each offer flexible arrangements. For larger parties, there are also two additional bedrooms with two twin beds each and en-suite bathrooms.Though it’s tempting to stay at the villa from sunrise to sunset—both of which can be viewed from the terrace—the village and nearest beach are both less than a quarter-mile away on foot. Stroll down to Soukia Beach to walk along its pebbled shores or snorkel in its clear waters, or head into Kassiopi to sample pastries from one of its bakeries or have a honeymoon-style dinner at an oceanfront restaurant. For a livelier scene, make the 50-minute drive into downtown Corfu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Mid-century-inspired decor brings a shot of cool to classic French Riviera architecture at this villa just steps from the shore. The outside charms with a tiled roof and sea-blue shutters, while the interiors take a modern turn with tapered-leg sofas and sculptural dining chairs. Walk 3 minutes and you’re swimming off sandy Bouillabaisse Beach or choosing a patio from the cafes lining its shores.Get your fill of sunshine in the loungers on the terrace around the swimming pool or cool off in the shaded al-fresco living and dining areas. After a seafood dinner from the barbecue, get your game on with friends and family at the indoor ping-pong and foosball tables, flip on the smart TV, or keep up with your feeds while on holiday over Wi-Fi.A row of sliding glass doors leads from the terrace to the open-concept great room at this vacation rental. At one end is the sitting area, with sofas atop a saturated area rug; at the other is the fully equipped kitchen, with its sleek white cabinets and breakfast bar. A dining table for 10 makes a wonderful place to gather right in the middle.This luxury property has three bedrooms with queen beds, including a master suite that opens to a furnished private terrace. There’s also one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with a twin bed. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, and TVs.The villa’s more than 3,000 square feet of living space sit only a 3-minute walk from Bouillabaisse Beach, whose golden sands offer a more low-key option compared to other beaches in this part of France. It’s also just a 5-minute drive from Saint-Tropez, whose cobblestone streets, waterfront restaurants, and great people-watching offer a honeymoon from the everyday.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This beautiful Tuscan villa is located within the Castelfalfi Resort about an hour outside Florence. Secluded amid verdant countryside dotted with hamlets and lush groves, the villa features ample alfresco living areas, exquisite interiors, and four bedrooms suites accommodating eight guests. With the resort's golf course and spa nearby, Angiola is an ideal vacation rental for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends seeking authentic Tuscan charm in a private but convenient setting.The single-level house with classic terracotta roof tile sets the stage for savoring the exquisite Tuscan light. A sparkling blue swimming pool invites you for a morning swim, while the large dining area beneath a pergola is ideal for alfresco meals. Gather in the covered veranda with sumptuous lounge areas for afternoon refreshments, and climb the spiral stairs to the roof lawn to watch the sunset.Indoors, a spacious great room with vaulted wood ceilings, gorgeous iron chandelier, and stone hearth invites you to drinks by the fire and feasts at the table for eight. On warmer evenings, open the French doors to the terrace and let the house breathe the fragrant air. The adjoining kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, providing a dream setting for the chefs among you. If you require private time for work or study, the villa features an office.Each of the four bedroom suites opens to the terrace, with lovely doors and windows illuminating each room with morning brightness and a serene afternoon glow. Two of the bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, while the other two share a Jack & Jill bathroom between them.The Castelafi Resort includes a top-shelf hotel, a 27-hole golf course, and an enchanting spa. Beyond its gates, you're an hour's journey from Florence and 55 kilometers to Pisa. Be sure to visit the splendid hamlet of Montaione, less than twelve kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stone walls rise above oak forests on Corsica’s hills at this traditional-outside, modern-inside home outside Porto-Vecchio. Tomato-red loungers await under crisp umbrellas, matching awnings stretch over balconies, and coordinating stools are ready at the al-fresco bar in the pool house. Ride horseback in the shallows at nearby Saint Cyprien Beach and sip a tropical cocktail from a beachfront bar. Spend your holiday in the sun with the help of outdoor living areas with a pool, lounging and dining furniture, a gas barbecue, a pool house perfect for entertaining, and a foosball table and tennis court where you can face off against friends and family. A private home gym lets you keep up with your routine, while a hot tub and sauna let you indulge. Classic stone-walled exteriors surround eclectic and modern interiors with pieces ranging from multi-color Tulum chairs to leather sofas to cantilevered dining chairs. With several sitting areas, you have the luxury of different spots to read or chat. The dining area, however, seats twelve, and more are welcome at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. This vacation rental has five bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning, so you can bring a party of up to ten to France. Each suite is a modern mix of sculptural furnishings and brightly colored accents, and the bathrooms feature details like carved stone sinks. This villa is a short drive outside Porto-Vecchio, where you can stumble across designer shops in the winding streets, spot French A-listers, and watch yachts dock in the marina by the bay. Relive your honeymoon on Saint Cyprien Beach, whose Caribbean-white sands are shaded by juniper trees, edged by restaurants and bars serving fresh seafood and drinks with tiny umbrellas, and frequented by horseback rides through the calm water that you can join. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ses Vistes, in Catalan, translates to ‘the views’ and that is certainly what this exceptional property supplies - outstanding 360 degree views that will take your breath away. Just a short walk from Cadaques on the Costa Brava, luxurious Ses Vistes is situated right on the Bay of Port Lligat on the spectacular Cap de Creus Peninsula.Surrounded by olive trees and built from the natural slate rock on which it rests, Ses Vistes has been thoughtfully designed by Catalan architect Fernando Torrent. Equally impressive are the modern and fastidious interiors by Mikkel Aranburuzabala of Bilbao. The focus is on space and light, with every window framing the tantalizing views. The villa is equipped to the highest standards with Wi-Fi, satellite television, under floor heating in the main living spaces, and two gorgeous gourmet kitchens, equipped with designer appliances. Downstairs there is a large living space, with an indoor courtyard that floods the space with natural light so you can enjoy indoor entertainment, play games or even use the space for an exhibition or teaching facility.There is a generous screen media room with satellite television and DVD connections so you can curl up in the evening. Separate areas off the living area include a table tennis room, an art preparation room and indoor passageway to the sauna and swimming pool complex. Outside your amenities include the sensational infinity pool, the perfect place to unwind and contemplate those unobstructed views. Or maybe you’d prefer to take time out in the hot tub or challenge a loved one to a game of petanque? Relax on the luxurious outdoor furniture or light the outdoor fire and gaze into the flames while sipping a soothing drink. There’s also a built-in barbecue grill for informal dining out.This glorious property includes eight restful and stylish bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and individual climate control, equipped with marvelous features and tactile fine fixtures and fittings that provide a flawless yet restful ambience.Whether you are seeking a vacation for family and friends or a special place to hold an event, Ses Vistes provides the perfect venue, offering luxury accommodation in a truly striking setting. It is a charming three minute walk to Port Lligat Beach and a 15 minute walk to the town of Cadaques. It’s a 20 minute walk to Church, the Clinic and tennis court. Peralada Golf Course and Figueres Train Station is a 38 km drive away, it’s a 87 km drive to the hospital and a 87 km drive to Girona Airport. The Pyrenees ski slopes are 172 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: In the vicinity of Siracusa —a beautiful and historic city on the Mediterranean—this contemporary home is one of our most eco-friendly luxury villas in Sicily.A large private swimming pool, open from April to October, features a diving board and spacious wooden deck, complete with lounge chairs. There’s also a private garden to wander through, solarium and a lush lawn. Exercise enthusiasts can keep up their routine in the fitness room, while film buffs can enjoy a movie night in the cinema room. A twice weekly tidying service and linen change is included in the rate.Inside, the décor is contemporary and stylish, with sleek finishings and pops of color. Eco-friendly technology is used throughout the home which has received a class A rating; features include solar panels, as well as radiant heating and cooling systems. The ground floor’s modern kitchen is equipped with an electric oven, five-burner gas stove, dishwasher and even a terrace with a barbeque.Up to 14 guests can comfortably stay in this villa’s six bedrooms, which each feature ensuite bathrooms with showers. The master suite boasts a king-sized bed, with a bath and hydro massage shower. In addition to the four bedrooms on the main level, there are two apartment suites downstairs, each with a kitchenette and living area.This villa is a great base for exploring Sicily’s southeastern regions. If you’re looking for a bit of surf and sand, the sandy shores of Fontane Bianche are just 14 km away. Local shops, restaurants and the Monasteri Golf Club are even closer at hand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stylish interiors, hotel-worthy amenities, a stunning view and a fabulous Chelsea location set Sloane Square Penthouse apart. This top-floor three-bedroom retreat with its own terrace feels like your own private retreat amid the bustle of the city. And when in Chelsea, you're close to everything from incredible independent bookshops and designer boutiques to some of London's most iconic attractions.The penthouse opens to a spectacular rooftop terrace where you can start the day with a coffee from the kitchen's espresso machine or finish the day with dinner from the barbecue. A suite of high-tech amenities ranges from an Apple TV and sound system to Wi-Fi, and heating, air conditioning and a fireplace ensure your comfort come rain or shine, cold or heat.The feeling of exclusive luxury continues inside the penthouse, where clean-lined pieces, blond-wood floors and plenty of windows create bright, inviting spaces. Perch on a pair of sofas in front of the fireplace in the living room, or steal away to one of the reading nooks for a quiet moment in the sun. An open-concept area with a fully equipped kitchen and Lucite dining table is both stylish and practical.The villa's three bedrooms are perfect for a group of friends on holiday, a city break with family or even a sightseeing honeymoon. All three have king beds and balconies; two have en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, and one shares access to a hall bathroom.Known for its period homes and hip reputation in the swinging '60s, today the Sloane Square area is home to bastions of the arts along with high-end shopping. Be sure to stop by John Sandoe, one of the city's best independent bookshops, on your way to the more well-known halls of Harrods, or spend an evening at The Royal Court Theatre, which showcases new writing. If you want to tick off your must-see list, you'll find Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Westminster Abbey and more just a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steep yourself in the cosmopolitan artistry of Bloomsbury at this 3-floor penthouse near Russell Square. A visionary architectural achievement, the home features 3 king suites and diverse living areas on all levels—including 2 terraces with alfresco dining—set amid a veritable museum of original artwork. The prime location is an easy walk from the British Museum, Oxford Circus, and myriad nightspots.On the main level, the gourmet kitchen with wet bar serves an interior dining table for 6 and ample lounge. Evocative features including a transparent ceiling, floating glass staircase, modernist dining stools, and natural wood floors create an ambiance of airy luminosity. A wide threshold opens to the lower terrace, featuring an outdoor dining table perched beside an impressive wall painting.Upstairs, skylight windows illuminate another lounge area and office space. A few steps lead up to the upper terrace, with yet another dining table and views of the Bloomsbury rooftops.The master suite includes a king bed, private patio, and deluxe ensuite bathroom with jetted hot tub and shower. The two guestrooms also have king beds and ensuite bathrooms, one of which includes an antique stand-alone tub. Each bedroom has its own character and unique collection of artwork. Throughout the penthouse, heating and air conditioning ensure comfort at all times.Bloomsbury and the surrounding neighborhoods offer an extraordinary combination of literary history and culture, world-class museums and galleries, independent shops, and excellent historic pubs. Enjoy mornings in Bedford or Russell Squares, stroll down Lamb's Conduit Street, and take in the masterpieces at the British Museum or National Gallery. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set over two levels of palatial splendor, this villa offers a breathtaking view of the Algarve coast and the shining Atlantic beyond. A truly magnificent poolside terrace lets guests enjoy Algarve mornings with peace and serenity assured. With room after room of spacious, considered design, this villa provides smart outfitting and deep comfort, plus the charm of nearby Lagos and numerous hidden beaches.The floor-to-roof windows that feature throughout Lux Mare I provide a flood of morning sunshine, with light reflecting off the seascape beyond and splashing across the entirety of the property. In this bright environment, guests can best experience the sun-oriented reading rooms (complete with recliners), kitchen and fully-outfitted living room. Passing the sumptuous bedrooms, guests can climb a staircase to take in another fine view of the rolling Portugeese countryside from the calm rooftop deck. The surrounding gardens, complete with cypress trees and groomed lawns, are punctuated by the splash of color that is the heated infinity pool, which mirrors the blue sea beyond and promises a refreshing break from the Portuguese heat at any time of day or night.Located on the outskirts of the historic town of Lagos, guests are within easy reach of the natural attractions of this part of the Algarve. Soak up the shimmer of the sun on the sea during a refreshing cliff walk, with numerous secluded beaches awaiting below. Get even closer to the natural beauty of the area via a refreshing cruise, sea-kayaking lesson or diving outing under the blue waves of the Atlantic. Visit miles of tranquil beaches and peaceful lighthouses to the national park to the west, before returning to Lagos for a delicious evening meal at one of the renowned local restaurants. The sunset glory of the seascape will await you upon your return to this impressive villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Close to the city, yet far away from it all, Ciggiano is a country villa in a great location. Just an hour’s drive from the Florence or Pisa airports puts you on a hilltop in the heart of Tuscany, at the entrance to this nine-bedroom estate. Though it was once a farmhouse, a recent restoration added modern amenities and accommodations.The villa’s gated entrance leads to its extensive grounds, which include a pool with outdoor shower and jetted tub, plenty of seating and an al-fresco dining area. Keep up with your workout schedule in the villa’s gym, and challenge friends and family at the ping-pong table. Thanks to the latest renovations, the villa is wheelchair-accessible and has Wi-Fi.The restoration did not, however, diminish the rustic charm of Ciggiano. In the living room, a wood-beamed ceiling and brick arches stand over a large, original fireplace, comfortable sofas and well-stocked bookshelves. The dining room has both a beamed ceiling of its own and expansive views of the landscape. In the kitchen, modern appliances sit next to traditional details like a stone-built oven and weathered-wood island.There are six bedrooms in the main house, each of which has an en-suite bathrooms. On the main house’s ground floor, you’ll find a bedroom with a king size bed and garden access. Upstairs, there are five bedrooms with double beds.Not only are the cities of Florence and Siena about 69 km drive from Ciggiano, the city of Lucca is only 61 km away and Pisa is 63 away. It’s also ideally located for visiting the hill towns of Tuscany. It’s 10 km to Montaione, 19 km to San Gimignano, 24 km to Volterra and Certaldo and 27 km to San Miniato. For shopping and dining, head to Iano, just 2 km away; for tennis and golfing, it’s a 5 km drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the classic Ibiza sun, sand and style in a brand-new way at Villa Sunset. Set in a gated community on the west coast near Cala Conta Beach, the newly built villa has sea views, a spectacular pool and terrace and sleek contemporary decor. Six suite-style bedrooms make the property perfect for family vacations or groups of friends.The heart of Villa Sunset is its beautiful outdoor living area. The house opens to two shaded outdoor dining areas with stone walls and clean-lined white furniture. Chaise longues covered by umbrellas line the L-shaped pool, and the whole space has views of the sea. Inside, the ambience of modern luxury is carried out by a television and sound system, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and ceiling fans and a heating system.The villa’s interiors are cool, white and contemporary, broken up by jewel-toned area rugs. In the open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen, the living room is anchored by a cream-colored sectional, green rug and minimalist fireplace. In the dining room, seating is on benches that echo the look of the sectional, but the space is defined by a red rug. The fully equipped kitchen is entirely white, with flat-fronted cabinets, a breakfast bar and a convenient separate pantry.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has a double bed, and five of the six have en-suite bathrooms and televisions. One of the bedrooms has air conditioning and ocean views as well. White walls, clean-lined furniture and built-in closets make the bedrooms serene and restful at night and bright and airy during the day.When you arrive, it’s a 20 km drive from the Ibiza airport to the villa. If you’ve come to Ibiza for the beaches, head to Cala Bassa Beach Club, just under 2 km away, Playa Bella, 7 km away, or Ocean Beach Ibiza, 10 km away. If you’d like to explore, it’s a 15 km drive from Villa Sunset to downtown Ibiza, a 9 km drive to the village of San Josep and a 26 km drive to Marina Botafoch.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make new memories in a traditional ambience at Timelea. Set in the Tuscan countryside just an hour from Pisa, Florence and Siena, this Montaione vacation rental is a quintessential Italian retreat. Details such as local stone and cotto floors, along with four bedrooms, make this a charming setting for a holiday with up to eight friends and family.Though Timelea looks out over the classic rolling hills of Tuscany, it also overlooks more modern features such as a golf course. Take in the views from al-fresco living areas with a pool, plenty of loungers on a sunny terrace, shaded sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. Other amenities include a satellite TV, sound system and Wi-Fi inside the house.It may be inspired by traditional architecture, but the great room at this luxury villa has a decidedly contemporary open floor plan. Gather in a sitting area around a decorative fireplace or sample local wines and produce at a dining table for eight, all under a beamed ceiling. The adjacent kitchen is fully equipped and has a convenient farmhouse-style breakfast table.Timelea has two bedrooms with double beds and private en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with shared bathrooms: one with a double bed and one with two twin beds. All four bedrooms open to a terrace.With everything from medieval villages to golf courses nearby, Timelea is a wonderful choice whether you want to explore, play or simply relax. Stroll through the restored village of Castelfalfi, discover local vineyards and olive oil producers, or drive to the town of Montaione for a casual meal or honeymoon-worthy night out. For a day trip, choose from the cities of Pisa, Florence and Siena, or make your way to one of the Mediterranean beaches.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Head for the hills at this Spanish colonial villa located amongst soaring mountain views on the outskirts of Marbella. Spend your afternoon lounging poolside beneath the shade of a palm tree while the kids play soccer on the lush lawn. When it cools down, head out for an early evening round at Aloha Golf Club or make your way into the city of Marbella for 2-star dinner at Dani Garcia.Swing the master bedroom’s private balcony doors open and invite fresh mountain air to fill the room while you get ready for the day. Follow terracotta flooring tiles and chandelier-lit ceilings through Birdie’s stately interior. When you arrive in the farmhouse kitchen, start yourself a Nespresso, and then proceed outside to enjoy the view from the shady gazebo.The wet bar, grill, and alfresco dining set on the terrace are perfect for casual meals. If you are feeling something more formal, decide on the dinner menu, and then pick the perfect pairing from the wine cellar. There’s plenty of parking space in the garage and driveway, as well as seating for 8. Or you could skip dinner and curl up by the fireplace for a movie night with that special someone.In the mood to relax on the beach? Park yourself in a sun lounger and listen to the soothing sound of the waves gently washing ashore on Bounty Beach. In the complete opposite direction, Nikki Beach Club is world-famous for its dance parties, famous guest DJs, and A-list clientele. Somewhere in between these vibes is Old Town, a labyrinth of restaurant and bar lined alleyways 26-km from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exceptional property is of the largest of the French Riviera villa rentals set within the exclusive La Réserve Ramatuelle resort just outside chic St Tropez. At 540 sq. meters (over 4860 sq. feet), there’s plenty of space and the setting is sheer bliss.The focus of attention has to be the fabulous pool, and the villa’s views across the sparkling Mediterranean Sea. All of our Reserve villas benefit from beautiful surroundings, and Villa 10’s tiered gardens are particularly impressive. It’s a wonderful place to spend lazy days lounging by the pool, or to enjoy long leisurely lunches on the shady terrace.Retreat into the cool, airy interior, elegantly designed by esteemed architects in modern Provençal style. Every last detail has been carefully thought through, from the flat-screen televisions to the superbly equipped kitchen. Continental breakfast is included, while guests also enjoy access to the resort’s Mediterranean restaurant, bar and spa.High-quality design, and superior furnishings and décor continue through each of the six air-conditioned bedrooms and their superbly appointed ensuite bathrooms. The master bedroom has direct access to the garden and a private sitting area.La Réserve Ramatuelle has a fantastic location high above the Mediterranean and just a few minutes from St Tropez, one of the Riviera’s best-known resorts. Take your pick when it comes to beaches, with the nearest less than two miles away. Ask your Luxury Retreats concierge about in-villa spa treatments and dining options available at this villa, at extra cost.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Chalet Nuit Blanc is a superb alpine villa outside Chamonix village, just a few minutes by car or shuttle from the slopes of Grands Montets. With sublime views of the Mont Blanc massif, fine spa features, and comfortable living areas, the chalet offers a quintessential experience of living in the French Alps. Six bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms include a kid-friendly bunkroom, forming an ideal home base for families. Chef services, daily housekeeping, and shuttle service to the ski slopes are included in the vacation rental.The chalet's open-concept living area feels at once spacious and warm, with a corner sectional facing the fire, a TV nook, and a beautiful dining table for twelve. An ample deck extends from the living room, inviting you to savor the mountain air and gaze upon the panoramic vistas of the valley and mountains. The fully-equipped kitchen features gourmet appliances, granite countertops, and luminous white appliances in lovely counterpoint to the natural wood paneling and beams.Downstairs, a cavernous home cinema is perfect for nighttime entertainment, while the sauna will soothe your body after the day's adventure. Behind the villa, a bubbling hot tub beckons you to a delicious dip in the open air.The top level of the chalet features a spacious king bedroom and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. On the floor below, there are three king suites, one queen suite, and a kids' room with a bunk bed and twin-size bed. Four of the bedrooms have ensuite bath or shower rooms, with shared access to the toilet in the hallway half-bathroomChalet Nuit Blanc balances seclusion and convenience in this historic jewel of the French Alps. The renowned piste and powder of Grands Montets ski area is just over one kilometer away, and Balme Vallorcine is less than five kilometers from your door. Drive less than six kilometers for the sublime vistas of Point de vue d'Argentiere, and just under ten kilometers to the rich alpine culture of Chamonix Village.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Capture fantastic ocean views from the indoor/outdoor pool of this hillside home near Monaco. Find the perfect spot to work on your tan atop the wood-decking of the scenic terrace. Move inside to relax in the sauna, hot tub, or next to a roaring fire. When you’re ready to hit the beach clubs, you’ll find Plage des Pirates and Plage du Borrigo within 10-minutes.Follow winding stairways, curved patios, and catwalk hallways through this elegant contemporary home to discover numerous ocean-vantage points and serene social settings. A mix of Spanish, French, and contemporary architecture gives Villa Cap Martin a look of its own. The greenhouse-style foyer is a beautifully scenic way to link spaces. The fully-equipped kitchen is sure to inspire your culinary creativity, especially if you’re into seafood, which is fresh and ready at the markets in town. On nights in, throw a soccer match on the widescreen and watch while you shoot a round of pool.If you’re in the mood to go out, Roquebrune-Cap-Martin has lots of local shops and oceanfront restaurants to check out. Moving south, Monaco’s beautiful beaches and bustling nightlife await. Spend a night at the opera, hit the clubs, or try your luck at the casinos in Monte Carlo. Back in France, drive 26 km to visit the museums, art galleries, and bustling restaurant-lined city squares of Nice.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled into Verbier Village’s vibrant downtown core, this luxurious seven bedroom offers an incredibly convenient location when accessing both the city and the slopes. With accommodations for fourteen, an amazing indoor spa and wellness center, and plenty of spacious chalet style living area, Dent Blanche is an exceptional home for your next alpine getaway. When it’s time to hit the slopes, Dent Blanche is just a five-minute walk from the Medran Lift, so you’ll have no trouble finding a fresh patch of powder every morning.You and your group of fourteen will love spaces like the home theatre, formal dining area, lounge, and bar, all perfect spots to recount tales from an exciting day. The classic chalet atmosphere is exactly what you’d hope for in a luxury mountain home. Whether you’re gathering around the large fireplace for a quiet evening with the family or hosting an alpine-chic social affair, Dent Blanche will make you feel right at home.After a long day on the mountain, there’s nowhere better to warm-up, relax, and rejuvenate than Dent Blanche’s indoor wellness area. Luxuriously adorned with an infinity swimming pool, sauna, and hammam, this indoor area is second to none. If you’d prefer to continue enjoying the mountain view while you warm-up, hop into the hot tub on the balcony. If you’ve still got some energy to burn, there’s a fitness center as well. To make your stay even more relaxing, Dent Blanche includes a chauffeur service, chef service, daily housekeeping, ski storage, and more.In the winter months, the Swiss Alps are home to some of the finest skiing on the planet, and Verbier is one of the country’s premier destinations. With an intricate network of ski lifts and cable cars, it’s easy to find the perfect runs for skiers of any experience level. In the warmer months, Verbier is well-known for its extensive selection of hiking trails. In the village core, you’ll find exciting shops, restaurants, and nightlife, all year-round.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take an idyllic holiday with a group of friends or extended family at San Agustin Exclusive. With sea views, lush gardens, sunny terraces and modern interiors, this Ibiza vacation rental is a stunning setting for a relaxed getaway. If you'd like to do some sightseeing, the nearby beaches and resort towns make it easy.San Agustin Exclusive sits on nearly an acre of private grounds planted with mature Mediterranean flora that feature a pool, pétanque court and basketball hoop. Stretch out on a lounger in the sun, watch the inhabitants of the fish pond or prepare a dinner on the barbecue to enjoy at the al-fresco table. Inside, you'll find an exercise room, ping-pong and football tables, a grand piano, plus a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.Wood-beamed ceilings and terracotta floors link the outdoor living areas to the indoor living rooms, and a large sliding door can be opened to let the breeze waft inside. Modern furnishings and an eclectic artwork lend a feel of sophisticated luxury. The vibe continues in the fully equipped kitchen, which has a small bar and an inviting breakfast table.From the villa's Port des Torrent location, it's only a short walk to the nearest supermarket and an 8-minute walk to the beach. More options whether the pretty and popular Cala Bassa or the family-friendly white sands of Cala Tarida, are a 5 minute drive. Both Sant Antoni de Portmany and Ibiza Town are easily accessible for shopping, dining, sightseeing or a night out at their legendary clubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Double wooden doors lead from cotto-floored rooms to expansive countryside views at this hilltop stone villa in the small Italian town of Ronti. While a recent refresh brought in details like glassed-in showers, the house still holds plenty of traditional charm in its painted furniture and stone walls. Spend leisurely days visiting the wineries dotting this part of Umbria or day-trip to Perugia.On sunny days, set up on a lounger by a private pool that offers views into the valley as you swim laps or splash as a family. Open a bottle of wine and light the charcoal barbecue for lunch and dinner at an alfresco table overlooking the same hills. If you need local inspiration—or just a wine recommendation—ask the house manager.Inside, the villa is a throwback in the best way, with cotto floors paving the way to living and dining rooms with wood-beamed ceilings, pastel walls that turn luminous in the passing sunshine, and details like painted chests and vintage chandeliers. The fully equipped kitchen seems to capture the colors of the scenery in its yellow and green hues. Upstairs, each of the 4 bedrooms has its own colorful personality, too.This vacation rental is a 10-minute drive from the nearest winery and a quick trip to sights like the Area Verde Marcignano, a verdant park, and the open-air Valdiferraio Museum. Take a day trip to Lake Trasimeno, one of the largest in Italy and home to several medieval towns, or the city of Perugia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Lush greenery and a never-ending sky encompass this gated, sun-drenched villa in the hilltops of Spain. Modern design and Spanish influence detail the natural light filled space with sliding doors and windows looking out to the surrounding countryside. Treat yourself to the convenience of having activities and excursions organized for you, or drive mere minutes to discover Ibiza’s local restaurants, bars and white sand beaches at Playa de Talamanca on your own day trip. A floating wooden staircase leads the way to the uniquely shaped pool and peaceful palm-lined lounging area—a relaxing place to chill out after exercising in the in-house gym or to simply work on your golden glow. Sprawl out on one of the parasol-shielded daybeds to retreat from the blazing sun. Plan ahead and have the villa’s modern kitchen pre-stocked with fresh groceries prior to your arrival. After grilling on the gas barbecue, an alfresco wicker dining set has seating for 6. Inside, glass walls separate the adjoining living and media rooms, creating the illusion of a fully fluid space. Plush cushions, accent rugs, and comfortable, oversized couches add a cozy element to Can Luminosa’s contemporary structure. Enrich the melody of nature with the sounds of classical guitar playing on the Sonos sound system or bring the party to you with something more upbeat. Soft terrace lighting makes it easy to enjoy the evening outdoors after the sun sets with a locally produced vi pagès (farmer’s wine) in hand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sunshine, sea views and serenity: Casa Marbena has everything you want in a Mallorca holiday. This elegant vacation rental near Bendinat boasts well-appointed outdoor living areas, Mediterranean vistas inside and out, and a garden to ensure privacy. Enjoy its prime location, stylish interiors and six bedrooms during a family holiday or an escape to the sun with friends.The villa’s three terraces let you take full advantage of the sea views, while lush plantings keep your stay quiet and private. On the ground floor, the house opens to a saltwater pool and lounging and dining areas with a gas barbecue—all lit so you can use them day or night. The second-level terrace has additional space for lounging and dining; from there, a spiral staircase leads up to a rooftop terrace with 180-degree views of the Bay of Palma.Neutral tones and chic furnishings give the interiors of Casa Marbena a sophisticated feel. Sliding glass doors lead from the pool terrace into an open-plan living and dining room filled with stylish pieces like a sleek sectional and Eames dining chairs. Follow the polished stone steps up to a great room with a casual dining table, sitting area and fully equipped kitchen, all flooded with sunshine by a skylight.Casa Marbena is only minutes from the Club de Golf Real de Bendinat, and a short drive from the glamorous resort town of Puerto Portals and lively Palma, a stunning city where you can stroll medieval streets in the shadow of the cathedral, discover up-and-coming artists in numerous galleries or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a gorgeous restaurant. The nearest beach is Cala Major, a beautiful stretch of sand that’s perfect for sunbathing and swimming.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gaze over northern Ibiza’s lush canopy to shimmering ocean views off the balcony of this elevated, hillside home. Get that perfect vacation tan in a cozy sunbed. When you’ve had your fill of the heat, hop into the refreshing swimming pool. Then, find a shady spot beneath a tree in the garden to do a little reading. At the end of your relaxing day, head to downtown Ibiza for a wild night. Finca Limonero, a recent renovation project, is rich with original features from its construction 300 years ago. Stone walls and wooden Sabina ceilings combine with sleek, modern architecture and contemporary furnishings to create the perfect combination of tradition and comfort. On nights in, gather for an alfresco dinner, host a pool party, or whip up a few tropical cocktails to sip in the hot tub. On quieter evenings, see what’s on the satellite or curl up with that someone special next to the fireplace. Located in the heart of the island, Santa Gertrudis is a former meeting place for Ibiza’s artists, musicians, and hippies. From the ’60s on, this small village has been a beacon for those inspired by the Bohemian lifestyle. If you travel towards the coast, you’ll find secluded beachfront at Aguas Blanca, Santa Eulalia, and Cala Llonga. For a more exciting beach experience, hit the oceanside clubs of Ibiza Town and Sant Antoni de Portmany. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find privacy in the city at this 16th-Arrondissement maison, not far from the Arc de Triomphe in the heart of Paris. Listen to the city of lights while you enjoy an alfresco breakfast on the elevated terrace. Finish your espresso while you catch up on some reading beneath the shaded overhang. Then, walk to Avenue Victor Hugo to see some of the country’s most beautiful architecture.Follow parquet floors through living and dining areas, past the grand piano, and out French doors to breezy balcony. Stop for a moment and smell the flowers on Maison Montespan’s expertly decorated garden terrace. Make yourself a snack in the outdoor kitchen. Or, use the fully-equipped kitchen inside to whip up something more substantial. Then, relax upon plush contemporary furniture in the living room.If the mood strikes, schedule a private yoga lesson in the home gym or swim in the counter-current indoor pool. After, rejuvenate in the ensuite’s spa-like soaking tub while the kids watch a movie in the media room. Then, make life even more comfortable and bring in a private chef for dinner. Housekeeping is complimentary, as is breakfast, and there’s a long list of luxurious add-ons available.Paris has no shortage of photo opportunities, so make sure to bring your camera when you visit the Eiffel Tower, Champs-Elysees, Notre-Dame, and the Palace of Versailles. When you need a break from the bustling streets, spend a few hours casually wandering the Louvre or take a guided tour if you’d like the history lesson. Then, walk over to the Seine for a dinner cruise at Calife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Blues set the mood—playful cobalt in the pool, dramatic navy in the media room—at this traditional-inspired estate. Magenta flowers twine along the wall of the private backyard, while cream and gray feel refined inside. The Algarve’s golden beaches are only 5 minutes away, and you can spend all day on the sand and be at an award-winning restaurant in Vale do Lobo or Quinta do Lago for dinner. Soak in the sun from a courtyard with a swimming pool and loungers, then try out local seafood on the barbecue to serve at an al-fresco table for 8. Entertain friends and family with the help of the media room, pool table, wet bar, cable TV, and Wi-Fi. The villa also features thoughtful touches such as a Nespresso machine, hairdryer, and laundry facilities. Double sliding doors lead from the pool terrace into a sophisticated open-plan living and dining room. Polished stone floors link a sitting area with a fireplace to a mirrored dining table with seating for 10. Equally inviting is a black-and-white kitchen with a breakfast bar along the central island. This luxury vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with king beds and 2 bedrooms with 2 twin beds each; all have en-suite bathrooms. They can accommodate groups of up to 10 on holiday together and, like the main living areas, have neutral palettes accented by pops of cobalt and pink. Put your feet in the sand at Garrão Nascente or relive your honeymoon with a stroll on Vale do Lobo Beach, both an 8-minute drive from the villa. A location between Vale do Lobo, Quinta do Lago, and Almancil puts you less than a 10-minute drive from 2 golf courses (and a slightly longer drive from several more) and a short trip from some of Portugal’s most acclaimed restaurants. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in one of Ibiza’s most exclusive new developments at Casa Matias. Just a short walk from the clear waters and sunset views of the Cala Conta beach—one of the island’s most beautiful spots—this gorgeous vacation rental offers luxury amenities in an unparalleled setting. Reserve its five bedrooms for a sunny escape with friends or a quiet holiday with extended family.Guests of Casa Matias are welcome to use the community’s shared fitness and spa center. The villa also has its own private outdoor living area with a saltwater infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Its high-tech amenities range from Apple and satellite TV to a sound system and Wi-Fi.More than 4,000 square feet of living space give you and your guests plenty of room to relax in contemporary style. In the open-plan living and dining room, stone walls are a textural contrast to the smooth white floors and glass sliding doors opening to the terrace, while a skylight illuminates the space from above. The fully equipped kitchen makes a dramatic statement with high-gloss white and red cabinetry.Casa Matias has three bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom to rival any honeymoon suite with its jetted tub and pool area access, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and, like the common areas, a sleek, contemporary vibe.From the villa, walk or make the short drive to the shores of Cala Conta to spend a day on the sand or take in the sunset views from the beach. In the evenings, dine out or dance the night away in Sant Antoni de Portmany, or get to the heart of it all: the legendary clubs and bars of nearby Ibiza Town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in a private enclave on the grounds of one of the finest hotels in Europe at Villa Garrovo. This newly restored luxury villa is part of the Villa d’Este, which has stood on the banks of Lake Como since the 16th century and has been offering five-star service in an unparalleled setting since the 1800s. Bring up to twelve family members or friends to take in the dramatic views and fresh lake breezes, or use the property’s garden to host an anniversary celebration or intimate destination wedding.Your stay at Villa Garrovo includes the use of the amenities at Villa d’Este and its sporting club, from the tennis courts and putting green to the swimming pools, sauna and hammam. Start each day with an in-villa continental breakfast or a buffet at the hotel’s restaurant, borrow bicycles to explore the area on two wheels or simply take in the Lombardy air from the sitting and dining areas on the villa’s terraces, courtyard and gardens.Built in 1833, the villa was recently renovated and now boasts both original architectural features and modern touches such as a projection system and security cameras. The gracious living areas face the lake and feature beautiful paneling, built-in cabinets, polished terrazzo floors and painted wall treatments. Tufted sofas and chairs create inviting sitting areas around the mirrored fireplace, while the dining room takes Asian inspiration for its Chippendale-style dining chairs. Though guests are welcome at the hotel’s restaurants and bar, this vacation rental does have its own fully equipped kitchen.Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Garrovo has an en-suite bathroom. There are two with queen beds, including a stunning, honeymoon-worthy master suite that opens to a private balcony, one room with a double bed and three bedrooms with two twin beds. Floor-length drapes, patterned carpets, floral-print bedding and antique furnishings give the bedrooms an air of both history and comfort.Named one of the best hotels in the world for its breathtaking location, Renaissance gardens and opulent decor, Villa d’Este is a holiday destination in itself. But if you have time, it’s worth making the short walk to the restaurants and shops in Cernobbio or the short drive to the city of Como for its churches and museums. Bellagio, just over 35 km away, is easily reached for a day trip to take in its historic villas and views, and Milan is about an 54 km drive from Villa Garrovo.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The past meets the present in spectacular fashion at Finca Can Basso. An authentic finca in the countryside near Santa Eularia des Riu, this traditional property has been renovated to standards of magazine-worthy luxury. Make it the backdrop to a relaxed holiday with family or a stylish Ibiza getaway with friends.Set amid more than six acres of land dotted with stone walls and almond, olive and fruit trees, Finca Can Basso is a tranquil world unto itself. Bask in the Mediterranean sun on a lounger on the terrace, swim in the huge private pool or sip wine at the al-fresco dining area. In the evenings, serve drinks from the bar, settle in by the TV and sound system, or stay in touch via Wi-Fi.A thoughtful blend of the traditional and modern distinguishes the interiors of this one-of-a-kind vacation rental. Wall-to-wall glass and a sleek sectional are paired with a sturdy wooden door in the living room, while in the dining room, a beamed ceiling balances out the sculptural chairs. Stone walls set off the ultra-minimalist workspace and appliances in the fully equipped kitchen.There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house—all with king beds and en-suite bathrooms—and two in guest suites with en-suite bathrooms and a double bed and king bed, respectively. External access to the guest suites means they can double as a honeymoon-style retreat or quieter accommodations for in-laws.Though Finca Can Basso feels like a secluded haven, it’s only a short drive from restaurants, shops and nightlife in the oceanfront town of Santa Eularia des Riu. Spend a day at the beach just minutes from the town center at Platja de Santa Eulalia, or drive the winding roads to picturesque Cala Llonga. For the ultimate night out, Ibiza Town is within easy reach by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Head for the hills at this traditional ski lodge in Gstaad. Lookout over the lush valley below and on to soaring mountain views. Bask in the authenticity of this alpine setting after a long day skiing the slopes of Bergbahnen and Videmanette. Warm-up while you relax beside a roaring fire. Then, head out for dinner at Chubut, known for its black Angus steak and impressive wine list.Each room of this Swiss chalet introduces you to a new character. Sink into a plush armchair with a good book in the cozy family room. Appreciate the intricate detailing on the main living room’s ceiling, and the carefully selected designer furniture below. In the kitchen, your inner chef will fall in love with the chalet’s restaurant caliber appliances and rugged-chic cabinetry.On quiet nights in, get a fire going in the fireplace, pick a bottle from the wine cellar, and gather at the formal dining set for an unforgettable dinner. After, see what you can find on television or get competitive over a board game. When you’re ready to retire for the evening, each bedroom comes with a lavish ensuite and a king or queen-sized bed.Nearly all year, you’ll find world-class skiing in the Bernese Oberland region. Glacier 3000 cable cars connect Gstaad to surrounding ski destinations Wispile and Rinderberg, offering hundreds of kilometers of all-level slopes and cross country trails. When you’re not skiing, check out the view at Huu’s and try their restaurant La Vue, followed by drinks in their old-school cocktail bar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just on the outskirts of the hills of Trapani sits a modern villa with columned terraces, a private heated swimming pool partially covered with a trellis, with whitewashed steps curve between the hillside gardens to the entrance. Sit in a swing chair and feel a calming, gentle sway, while lifting a glass in tribute to these earthy rustic hillsides.Villa Asami is a sleek, modern, simple villa with sunbaked terraces, catwalks, and open rooms with an earthy palette and minimal furniture. Hillside views are seen out of every window and at every level. There are a sauna and emotional shower. Dining can be both inside or out, both elegant yet casual. Mix Tai Chi on the terrace, add meditations by the waterfall, stir in hours of baking in the sun on a lounger with a dash of swims in the pool, and it all makes the perfect recipe for total relaxation.Take the cable car to explore medieval Erice. It’s 751 meters above Trapani. Grey buildings, cobblestone streets, many churches, and castles make a memorable day trip. See the salt pans and old windmills of Trapani, just a few miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Porto Zante is one of Greece’s most distinguished high-end luxury resorts. Just off the coast of the magical Ionian Sea, the One Royal Spa Villa is the perfect setting for an unforgettable vacation or honeymoon. With it’s own private area on Porto Zante’s white sand beach and an endless ocean view from every room, this unit is positioned for optimal privacy without sacrificing any of Greece’s beautiful scenery.All three of the One’s ocean facing walls have extra-wide openings to the terrace, ensuring the free flow of fresh ocean air and natural sunlight. The living room is decorated with wood flooring, designer furniture, and a relaxing neutral colour scheme. From the couch, the ocean view is framed perfectly. The bedroom also features a picturesque ocean view, ideal for sunrises and late night star gazing. The en-suite opens to the terrace as well, it features a dual vanity, rain shower, and a jetted tub.Have a seat on the outdoor couch in the terrace’s covered section and look north-east, here’s what you’ll see. First, the swimming pool with hydrotherapy device, then, on the lush green grass, alfresco dining, sun loungers, and local shrubbery. And, of course, the endless vista of the Ionian Sea. Back inside, you’ll enjoy all the comforts of home, satellite television, sound system, Wi-Fi, Playstation, and air conditioning. And, included with your stay you’ll receive daily housekeeping, turndown service, a butler, and access to Porto Zante’s many amenities.You’re privately reserved beachfront on Porto Zante’s coast features personal sun beds, beach umbrellas, and snorkelling gear for exploring the crystal clear water. Over at The Club house Restaurant’s beachfront setting, you’ll enjoy the finest Greek, Mediterranean, and Asian cuisine. Or if you’re in the mood for sushi, try Maya Restaurant, another beautiful beachfront dining experience. Nearby, visit Navagio, better known as “Shipwreck Beach”, where it’s told a smuggler ship washed ashore within the rocky walls of the magnificent bay.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Chalet Orsini is a spectacular chalet in the Swiss Alps on the edge of Verbier. Located just a few minutes from Les Creux cable car, the chalet offers an ideal balance of convenience, seclusion, and truly sublime mountain views. Gorgeous alfresco spaces (including a superb hot tub), exquisite interiors, and five enchanting bedroom suites make Chalet Orsini the perfect vacation rental for ski vacations or summer alpine adventures with family and friends. The catered option includes private chef, hosting, and transport, among other features and services.The villa's interior is at once spacious and perfectly cozy, with original artwork and lovely antiques evoking consummate alpine elegance and charm. After a vigorous day on the mountain, unwind in the living room over canapés and champagne, kindling a fire in the stunning, wood-burning fireplace. Select a bottle of fine wine from the cave, and gather around the dining table for a privately catered feast. At night, gather in the splendid home theater for a favorite movie, or shoot pool in the parlor with adjoining TV lounge. The beautiful, light-filled kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and it shares a room with a lovely wood table and second wood-burning fireplace—perfect for warm breakfasts before the next adventure.Top-shelf spa facilities and a multiple terraces deliver next-level luxury. Enjoy a soak in the outdoor hot tub while savoring some of the finest alpine views imaginable, or relax on elegant lounge furniture with a cup of hot cocoa. Reward yourself with a trip to the private spa, refreshing your body in the Hammam and relishing a well-deserved massage.The chalet features five bedrooms—three with double beds, one with two bunk beds, and one with a bunk bed and trundle bed—sleeping thirteen in all. The master suite enjoys spectacular mountain views, a wood-burning fireplace, an office space, and a private balcony. Two of the guestrooms enjoy beautiful views as well, and one opens to the balcony with hot tub. All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.Chalet Orsini is perfectly located just a kilometer from Les Creux cable car and just over two kilometers from the heart of Verbier village. The world-class Club de Golf Verbier is just three kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located at the center of the St. Tropez peninsula, Ramatuelle is a beautifully scenic French village that looks out over the Bay of Pampelonne, with the breathtaking Alpilles Mountain range provided an equally incredible background. Situated in the La Reserve estate, this luxurious five-bedroom is the perfect escape for a beach vacation with family and friends. Nearby, you’ll be exploring the sandy coves and secluded inlets of Pampelonne Beach, as well as discovering the narrow alleyways and boutique shops of St. Tropez.Showcasing the iconic French architecture of the seventies, La Reserve, although a mostly a new building, still features some of the original buildings most notable attributes, like the tower section that leads from the upper level to the terrace. Inside, you’ll enjoy the simplistic elegance of high-end designer furniture, a soothing color palette, and plenty of openings to the beautiful outdoors. Tech features like Wi-Fi, Apple TV, an exercise room, and satellite television will help you keep up with daily routines, should you desire. And, Villa 1’s fully equipped kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity with its functional layout and to of the line appliances.Outside, you’ll find gorgeous palm trees and lush greenery surrounding the swimming pool, terrace, and alfresco dining area. During your stay, you’ll appreciate daily housekeeping, and access to La Reserve’s restaurant, spa, and beautiful seashore.The village of Ramatuelle is known for its rich cultural life, particularly for music and theatre. Check in with La Reserve’s concierge for an up to date events schedule, as jazz, classical, and theatre festivals are quite common in this region. Neighboring villages Gassin, Cavalaire, and St. Tropez are all great spots for day-trips, and they’re all within fifteen miles. While you’re out exploring, consider a cycling a tour, it’s an incredibly popular way to get around the peninsula, and you’ll surely be rewarded with absolutely breathtaking views of the coast, ocean, and countryside.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated near the town of Agrigento in southwestern Sicily, just minutes from the beach and world-renowned Greek ruins, the seven-bedroom Villa Agora provides a spectacular sanctuary for families and destination wedding guests seeking privacy and unparalleled Sicilian enchantmentSurrounded by lush and verdant hillsides, the villa's outdoor spaces offer myriad opportunities for relaxation and play. Take a swim in the gorgeous swimming pool around the palm tree island, or bathe in the spectacular, lagoon-like hot tub amid massive stones and dreamy cypresses. Savor the Mediterranean sun on elegant loungers, and sip your morning espresso on poolside tables. In the afternoon, enjoy a game on the football (soccer) pitch, before relishing a meal at the alfresco table, prepared at the outdoor kitchen with barbeque grill. In the evening, sip a fine Italian wine on the veranda as the light fades over the hills.The villa's Main House includes an exquisite living lounge with sumptuous leather sofa and flat-screen television, and an adjoining open-plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen, a dining table for six, and a comfortable lounge. High ceilings of exposed wood and floors of smooth stone tile echo the villa's bucolic setting, while the furnishings and décor offer exquisite, contemporary style. The Main House bedrooms include the master suite, with king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted tub, and two guest rooms—on with double bed, one with twin—with ensuite bathrooms.The Annex features an outstanding spa on the ground floor, with Turkish bath, hot tub, and fitness room, as well as a kitchen and living room on the first floor. The first floor has three bedrooms, including one with ensuite bathroom and two that share a bathroom between them. The ground-floor bedroom has a double bed and ensuite bathroom. There is also an excellent game room.Villa Agora is wonderfully situated for enjoying one of the most beautiful areas Sicily, and indeed all of Italy. Agrigento and the nearby Valley of the Temples—designated a World Heritage Site for the splendor of its Greek Ruins—are just minutes away. San Leone Beach is only ten kilometers (about six miles) from your door and the white cliffs of the Scala dei Turchi are also nearby.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
